reaction medium: The experiment uses pure water as the reaction medium, with 10 mL of the sacrificial agent (TEOA) added to 50 mL of it.
operation mode: The experiment appears to be conducted in a continuous mode, as the hydrogen generation process is monitored in real-time using a gas chromatograph and an online analysis system.
